text: Savidham is a 1992 Indian Malayalam film, directed by George Kithu, starring Nedumudi Venu, Shanthi Krishna, Sunitha and Maathu in the lead roles.http://www.malayalamcinema.com/userreview_savidham-.htm ==Cast== *Shanthi Krishna as Sudha Thamburatty *Maathu as Reena / Meera *Nedumudi Venu as Ramavarma Thampuran (Ramji) *Kaithapram *Ashokan *Sunitha as Neelima *Shari *Aranmula Ponnamma as Cheriyamma *Mamukkoya as Balakrishnan *Suresh Gopi - as Sethu Madhavan Nair - Flashback story lover of Sudha Thampuratty (Guest appearance) ==Awards== Kerala State Film Awards 1992 * Best Play Back Singer - k s chithra ("Mounasarovaram".) * Second Best Actress - Shanthi krishna ==References== ==External links== * Category:1992 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Savidham
